com.brinybeach.tinywebserver

Class HttpRequestParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brinybeach.tinywebserver.HttpRequestParser

  • public class HttpRequestParser
extends java.lang.Object
    A recursive descent parser that parses characters from an InputStream according to the HTTP specification. A recursive descent parser was chosen over other approaches such as using REGEX because the HTTP RFC 2616 was full of BNF samples that could be implemented almost directly using a RD parser. See RFC-2616. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616 author: bryantbunderson

        public HttpRequest parse(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
